column1: CHINA Stole Remdesivir from Gilead then Tried to Patent the Drug in January -- Knowing Months Ago It Would Treat Coronavirus and Trying to Make Money off the Pandemic https://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2020/04/china-stole-remdesivir-gilead-tried-patent-drug-january-knowing-months-ago-treat-coronavirus-trying-make-money-off-pandemic/?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=PostTopSharingButtons&utm_campaign=websitesharingbuttons via @gatewaypundit
Rubbish, it’s China’s fault, this Chinese Virus (Coronavirus) started in China and they failed to tell the world. China is a communist regime not to be trusted.
China is were the Chinese Virus (Coronavirus) started not the UK. BBC should realise this, send China the bill.
